text: The People's Republic of Benin was a socialist state in the Gulf of Guinea on the African continent. It became present-day Benin. The People's Republic was started on November 30, 1975, after the 1972 coup d'Ã©tat in the Republic of Dahomey. It lasted until March 1, 1990, with a new constitution. The end of Marxism-Leninism in the nation was in 1989.Benin ==References== Category:1990 disestablishments in Africa Category:History of Benin Category:Former socialist republics Category:Former dictatorships Category:1972 establishments in Africa
title: People's Republic of Benin
